lead_paragraph: The Sports of The Times column on Thursday, about the European Champions League soccer match between Barcelona and Chelsea, misidentified, in some editions, the player who tumbled theatrically after being fouled by Barcelona’s Eric Abidal, who received a red card for the infraction. He is Nicolas Anelka — not Didier Drogba, a Chelsea teammate.
